title: PWV Fund I Q3 Update (Virtual)
description: Hosted by Jennifer Tacheff, David Price & David Thyresson. This is a virtual event for both current and prospective PWV LPs. We'll cover: Investments & Pipeline: Updates on investment highlights and upcoming opportunities. Fund Progress: What's next for our second close and the fund. Strategic Priorities: Focus areas through end of the year. Open Discussion. Why Attend: Stay informed on the most important fund updates. Share input and perspectives directly with the general partners. Align on strategy and next steps moving into the next quarter.
